name: Sly Feline
description:
Description

A short 2D puzzle game consisting of 5 levels, not the most challenging of puzzle games out there, but hopefully it can provide a little entertainment. Click the X in the top right of the tutorial window to close it.

Controls

WASD / Arrow Keys: Movement

Space: Close eyes (Can be pressed again to keep eyes closed)

Concept

If you can't see them, they can't see you! Use this to steal the cheese from the rats and escape!

Created as a submission for the "Mini Jam 80: Cats" game jam.

Credits

Gerpar / Gerad P. - Solo Jam

Jam Theme / Limitation

Theme: Cats

Limitation: 8x8 textures

Going with the 8x8 textures limitation, I also decided to make the level grids 8x8 to fit with the limitation, and even though it wasn't required, I also tried making some 8x8 text textures as well.
